content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Dear Maryam, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Duisburg. To begin our negotiation, let me propose an initial price of 1200 Euros per month. Now, please share your proposed rental amount to continue the discussion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because as a student with limited resources, I find 1200 Euros per month too expensive for this apartment. I am looking for a more affordable option that aligns with my budget.

TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
